HDG.ID.content: metaphysics thinks Being of beings: ground-giving unity of most general, what is indifferently valid everywhere, unity of all that accounts for ground (the All-highest [des Höchsten über allem]): the grounding ground > metaphysics as the accounting for/of the ground: true gravity [Nietzsche] of onto-theology
